options.name: Daily Action : Scholar's Memory
options.description: When you first encounter a creature, faction or entity, you can make an academic check to recall historical information to aid you in battle. On a 6-9, you learn your target's lowest mitigation and one condition it is not immune to. On a 10 or higher, you learn two of the target's lowest mitigations and two conidtions it is immune to.

options.name: Art of War
options.description: You have studied military history and tactical theory extensively. Gain +1 skill with logic. Your Scholar's Memory ability works on humanoid creatures, organized groups, and military formations, providing bonuses to predict their tactics and exploit their strategies.

options.name: Arcane Studies
options.description: You have delved into the histories of magical creatures and otherworldly beings. Gain +1 skill with magic knowledge. Your Scholar's Memory ability works on magical creatures, elementals, fiends, celestials, and other supernatural entities.

options.name: Ancient Languages
options.description: You are experienced in ancient, and sometimes exotic languages. Gain +1 skill with expression and learn 2 magical languages at a basic level.

options.name: Lore of the Ancients
options.description: You can identify the history and properties of ancient items and architecture. Gain +1 skill with resilience. You can spend 10 minutes examining an object or structure to learn its history, purpose, and any special properties. You gain a bonus dice on this check if the item is related to your chosen specialization (military artifacts for Art of War, magical items for Arcane Studies).

options.name: Master Scholar
options.description: Your research abilities have reached professional levels. Gain +1 skill with academics. Your Scholar's Memory ability can now be used twice per day on the same creature type, and you automatically succeed on checks to recall basic historical information.

options.name: Action : Inspiring Tale
options.description: You recount a legendary tale that inspires your allies to greatness. All allies within a moderate (20 unit) distance gain temporary health equal to your academics skill and a bonus dice on their next skill check. This ability can only be used once per encounter.

options.name: Reaction : Historical Precedent
options.description: In response to an enemy using a special ability or spell, you can recall a historical counter-strategy. Make an academics check against the ability's complexity or difficulty. On success, choose one ally within a short (10 unit) distance to gain advantage against that specific ability for the rest of combat.

options.name: Living Legend
options.description: Your knowledge has become so vast that you are a walking repository of history. Your Scholar's Memory ability no longer has daily limits, and when you successfully recall information about a creature, all allies who can hear you also gain the tactical benefits for the encounter.
